title: HOUR 1 - NBA Finals, Mayfield, Irving
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - NBA Finals, Mayfield, Irving
description:
Colin previews the NBA Finals and gives his prediction

Baker Mayfield would be a good fit on the Saints

Would the Nets trade Kyrie Irving?

 

Guest: Sam Amick
